Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.controller

Class PreparationViewControllerAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.example.batallanaval.controller.PreparationViewControllerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreparationViewController
Direct Known Subclasses:
PreparationViewController
public abstract class PreparationViewControllerAdapter extends Object implements IPreparationViewController
Abstract controller class for the Preparation View in the Battleship game.

This class implements the IPreparationViewController interface and defines the main logic for interacting with the game preparation UI. It manages boat placement, grid interaction, input validation, and transitions to the next game state.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Esteban Arias, Junior Lasprilla Prada, Steven Fernando Arag√≥n
